interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Natural Honey,Ultra Hydrating and Exfoliating Scrub for Nourishing Essential Body Care - 12.3 oz Review Date: 2019/10/01 Store: Natural Solution Product Description: ['Formulated using unique and natural ingredients of Himalayan Pink Salt and honey. The abrasive material like salt, sugar, rice bran, jojoba beads that rubs away the dead skin cells on the surface, revealing the softer, younger cells. Carefully hand blended with organic essential oils, skin smoothing enhancers and the undeniable exfoliating power of pure, fine grain Dead Sea Salts. Nothing artificial, no chemicals.'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natural Solution', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing, Nourishing, Cleansing', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246A', 'UPC': '818581019805', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'} Review Text: This body scrub is really nice. It smells so good and it smooths the and nourishes the skin perfectly. When you rub this gently onto your skin then rinse it off you can instantly feel the difference. It feels as if all the dead skin has been removed and your pores have been opened. It leaves you soft and refreshed as well as incredibly relaxed.
This is a big jar as well that you get and it's worth it for the price. It's definitely worth giving a try if you are interested and able to. It's really good. I love it. Review Title: Really good stuff! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Underarm Sweat Pads - 80 Pack Dress Shields Armpit Shields Disposable Anti Sweat Women And Men For Fight Hyperhidrosis LADES {'Brand': 'LADES', 'Number of Items': '80', 'Unit Count': '80.00 Count'} These underarm sweat pads are just the thing for that extra protection in times of need! Sometimes no matter how much or what kind of deodorant you use, you just can't seem to stop the unsightly and ever so embarrassing pit stain of doom. With these placed in your shirt the sweat never reaches your shirt and your garments are saved!
These work very well. To use them you simply lay your shirt down flat, remove the covering over the adhesive, place firmly in the spot needed, and you are good to go. When you are going to take it off remember to very gently remove it because it can become pretty sticky. It mentions this when you read about the product above but it is worth the reminder here!
These work very well and are a good option if you have problems often or occasionally with sweaty underarms. These work well Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Natural Honey,Ultra Hydrating and Exfoliating Scrub for Nourishing Essential Body Care - 12.3 oz Natural Solution ['Formulated using unique and natural ingredients of Himalayan Pink Salt and honey. The abrasive material like salt, sugar, rice bran, jojoba beads that rubs away the dead skin cells on the surface, revealing the softer, younger cells. This is a big jar as well that you get and it's worth it for the price. It's definitely worth giving a try if you are interested and able to. It's really good. I love it. Really good stuff!
profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Focus on Personal Care:** The user is dedicated to maintaining personal hygiene and comfort, particularly regarding underarm sweat management, while also exploring general body care products.

- **Practical Solutions:** Prefers items that offer discreet and effective solutions for managing discomfort and embarrassment, as demonstrated by the purchase of disposable sweat pads and interest in body scrubs.

- **Effectiveness and Reliability:** Values proven, effective products; recent interactions reflect an appreciation for items that enhance skin health and provide noticeable benefits, emphasizing the importance of reliable results.

- **User-Friendly Design:** Appreciates easy-to-use products with straightforward instructions for both application and removal, ensuring a hassle-free experience.

- **Moderate Brand Loyalty:** Engages with specific brands that offer the desired features; the user appears willing to explore different products from familiar brands, suggesting a blend of loyalty and openness to new discoveries.

- **Diverse Interests in Personal Care:** The user has expanded their interests to include body care through exfoliating products, indicating a commitment to holistic personal care that goes beyond sweat management.

- **Open to Future Purchases:** The user shows a willingness to try additional related products or innovations in personal care, expanding their repertoire of effective solutions for a variety of personal care needs.
